@ hackpsp7 Found out how to save, Set the properties for the fguy.exe (under compatibility) to RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR. you might also want to change the ACCESS LEVELS to FULL CONTROL under all access levels under the SECURITY tab. Apparently the program doesnt install with ADMIN functions so it doesnt know its allowed to save (kinda gay) .. At any rate, this WILL allow you to save.
RUN The program as administrator and you can save
